attributes.title: App is surprisingly fun
attributes.review: I actually enjoy this even though i dont want to :(

attributes.title: He's with us
attributes.review: Well designed and solid-performing app.  Great way to stay connected to campaign. #trumptrain #neverhillary

attributes.title: Makes APPs great again
attributes.review: This app, if used right can be a very powerful tool in helping ensure a Trump victory.  Nicely done!

attributes.title: Holy S#*t
attributes.review: My mom just walked in with a plate of chicken tendies and I knocked the plate out of her hand. Now she's yelling and swearing at me. I'm so distressed, I thought Bernie was ahead in the polls! This is so f**ked.

attributes.title: MAGA
attributes.review: Such a great app for keeping up with the Trump Train. Be warned... Critics of the God Emperor will throw their tendies to the floor when they see this app on your phone. The Trump Train has no brakes, folks. MAGA.

attributes.title: Great App to get message
attributes.review: Get the message directly. Great way to follow what is happening  and stay in touch.

attributes.title: Great app
attributes.review: I've been looking for a political app to give me updates and poll numbers, this app is exactly what I was looking for. Thank you Mr. Trump!

attributes.title: Truly Exceptional Idea!
attributes.review: This app is a great idea on how to get the public involved in politics! The app is designed very well also!!

attributes.title: Great app that's easy to use
attributes.review: Very well made excellent user interface!

attributes.title: Not censored
attributes.review: Seriously, look at Hillary's app, reviews are no longer visible! This one is not afraid of a little truth, big shock there!
